EmailTemplate.name: 2019.09.09 - Sept Email Blitz.September Blitz Week of Sep 9
EmailTemplate.subject: Stock up on Paper Today. 2 Packs for $10!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Boise Aspen 30 Multi-Use Recycled Copy Paper 20 lb., Letter-Size, 500 Sheets/PK 2 packs for $10. Limited time only.
Free Shipping In Stock Clearance Big Deals Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1 866 391‑8111 *Available from Monday September 9, 2019 - Friday, September 13th, 2019. Can't be used in conjunction with any other promo or offer. While quantities last. Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special-order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1 866 391‑8111 for details.
**Please allow up to 30 days for any bonus points to be added to your account. To check your current Grand Rewards points balance, please sign in to your account. © 2019 Grand & Toy Limited
